name: Escargot 2: The Slimy Sequel
description:
They thought he was going to be dinner but, he's no ordinary snail.  Help Mr. Charles P. Slimy Pants escape a horrid fate, in this terror of a kitchen.

WASD:    MOVE

ARROW KEYS:  SHOOT

ESC: PAUSE GAME

Created in 2 weeks for LOWREZJAM 2019
